record.title: ELECTION OF THE HONORABLE ROBERT C. BYRD AS PRESIDENT PRO TEMPORE

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I send a resolution to the desk.

speaking-unknown-id.name: The Vice President
speaking-unknown-id.paragraph: The clerk will report the resolution by title.

record.narrative: The legislative clerk read as follows:

speaking-unknown-id.name: The Vice President
speaking-unknown-id.paragraph: Without objection, the resolution is considered and agreed to.
The resolution (S. Res. 3) was agreed to, as follows:
Resolved, That Robert C. Byrd, a Senator from the State of West Virginia, be, and he is hereby, elected President of the Senate pro tempore.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I move to reconsider the vote.
I move to lay that motion on the table.

record.narrative: The motion to lay on the table was agreed to.

speaking-unknown-id.name: The Vice President
speaking-unknown-id.paragraph: Senator Byrd will be escorted to the desk.
Senator Robert C. Byrd, escorted by Mr. Reid, Mr. McConnell, and Mr. Rockefeller, respectively, advanced to the desk of the Vice President, and he subscribed to the oath in the Official Oath Book.
